name: Browser Open
description: Open and read content from a web page or document. This tool can access specific URLs or document IDs to extract detailed information.
author: DurgasAI

input_parameters.name: id
input_parameters.description: Document ID or URL to open (use -1 for latest)

input_parameters.name: cursor
input_parameters.description: Starting position in the document (default: -1 for beginning)

input_parameters.name: num_lines
input_parameters.description: Number of lines to read (default: -1 for all)

input_parameters.name: view_source
input_parameters.description: Whether to view the HTML source code (default: false)

output_parameters.name: content
output_parameters.description: Content of the opened page or document
